definitions.title: n. f.
definitions.body: groan, groaning;—cstr. [[נַאֲקַת]] Ex 6:5; sf. [[נַאֲקָתָם]] Ex 2:24, Ju Jdg 2:18; pl. cstr. [[נַאֲקוֹת]] Ez Eze 30:24; —groaning of oppressed people Ex 2:24, Ex 6:5, Ju Jdg 2:18; of a wounded man Ez Eze 30:24; (LXX Co [[וּבָזַז בִּזָּה]] for MT [[וְנׇאַק נַאֲקוֹת]] but cf. Berthol).
